originalText.text: As a clinical psychotherapist, I was finding difficulty getting new clients.  Your Resume Partners helped highlight my extensive experience and education in my field that helped put me on the map.  The expertise and personalized service offered a customized approach which exquisitely summated my talents.  I am certain she will do the same for you.

originalText.text: This is a terrible service, buyer beware. They charged exorbitant fees for merely typing a resume. There were no critiques of the information I provided. There were no questions as to why I needed the resume or what my goal was. My resume was simply typed over without any offer to reword it. I had to ask questions. I feel cheated and ashamed after using an expensive typing service. I am now looking for another service. The person told me that my resume was great and charged me nearly $300 for it. This is an egregious violation of professional standards. Resume services should provide feedback and assistance with crafting a resume, not simply retype what was provided. In addition, charging such a high fee for this type of service is unacceptable and predatory.   Her only contribution was to reformat my old resume. Save your money. Due to my desperate search for a job, I was cheated and financially abused. Due to the fact that they simply copied the old resume and reformatted it, this service failed to provide any value for the money they charged. The service also failed to answer any questions regarding the trends in developing recent resumes, nor did they provide any guidance or advice on how to make the resume more competitive.

originalText.text:
They were targeting me with ads so I did a resume critique with them and then placed my order for a resume update. I waited for many days for some communication. When I didn’t hear back, I emailed them on two different addresses to enquire after my order. No one responded for many days so I called my credit card company to dispute the charge as I feared a scam. Days later I got an email saying there was a problem on their backend and they would work on my resume. They did send a basic draft to which I gave detailed feedback and also cancelled the dispute. But TopResume closed the order and when called them, they said they would wait for the money to come back into their account. I called again in a few days and they confirmed that they had received the payment and would have the writer reach back within 1-2 days. After 6 days I hadn’t heard anything so I called back. They asked me  to wait for another day but again I didn’t hear anything for 2 days so I called again. They stopped taking my calls so I had to use another number to call them. The CS rep said she would request a refund but cannot promise it. I have a sinking feeling I will not get my money back or a resume.

This has been a very frustrating and distressing experience. I have huge regrets going with TopResume. So much wasted time and no resume to show for it. I wish I had gone for someone else or even used this time to update it myself.

Please don’t use TopResume if your money and time is valuable. You’re better off spending a little more with a more professional company who will give you what you paid for in the timeline they promise. Read other review sites for unbiased and current reviews.

originalText.text: I went to resume partners to get my resume and cover sheet professionally done since I haven't been receiving any responses back to jobs I had been applying to. I spoke with Mrs.Etta who was the one that would be working on my project. I told her specifically what field I was looking to get into. My resume & cover sheet was done within a week and it came out perfect. I thank Mrs Etta for all the hard work. She is great at what she does & is very professional. I recommend any one who needs a resume & cover sheet done to see Mrs. Etta. She's very sweet & great at what she does.

originalText.text: Etta was wonderful to work with.  I am a career changer applying to a graduate school program in an un related field who has not updated my resume in years.  Etta was able to extract traits from my resume that would align with my new chosen profession and make them the focus of my resume.  She also helped me edit and streamline my personal statement and gave some advice on recommendation letters.  I would definitely recommend her for anyone needing help with a resume or personal statement.  She made the process very easy!
